content.detailedDescription: The event occurred on tuesday november 17, 2009 at exactly 6:01 pm in the new kensington pa area. i was in new kensington at the bottom of coxcomb hill. i was driving to pick up dinner when i noticed an extremely bright light in the distance hovering or moving extremely slow. i proceeded to try and move closer to the object and determine its location and what it was since i had never seen such a bright object in the sky. i was picking up dinner at the top of the hill, coxcomb hill in new kensington, so i decided to go to the top to gain a better vantage point. at first i had wondered if maybe the light was on a building or another structure since it was difficult to see the backdrop against the dark sky but i eventually noticed it was at least 1000 feet off the ground, if not several thousand. the object was in my sight the entire time. i proceeded to the top of the hill where i saw a disc shaped object glowing with a white light with a blueish tinge on the bottom in the center. once towards the top of the hill the light from the object was bright enough and i close enough to see that it was triangular in shape and the light i was seeing was directly in the center of the object and was round in shape. it then started to move off, once it did 3 other lights appeared on the 3 corners of the object, not as bright as the light in the middle. it moved off heading in the direction of the plum borough area and disappeared over the next hill top. shortly after i noticed what appeared to be a helicopter moving in the same direction as the object had, i could not make any identification on the type of chopper it was but since choppers are not very common in the area and one was moving off in the same direction as the object very fast. the whole encounter only lasted a few minutes but it was the most unusual event of my life and i have never seen such an object before. the object did not resemble any traditional aircraft i had ever seen, it did not emit any sound, and it moved very slowly at first, or not at all it was difficult to tell since i was moving. however once at the top of the hill it was stationary and then moved off very quickly which to my knowledge is not possible with current aviation technology. the shape was also unusual as it was an exact triangle with lights on the tips and one amazingly bright light in the center, quite possible the brightest light i have ever seen in the sky. the center light was so bright it appeared to shine a beam to the ground faintly. the other thing that was unusual is the object had no traditional marker lights, and the 3 lights on the tips that appeared once the craft started moving off.
content.summary: Extremely luminous slow moving object changing speed and direction quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was going out back in my backyard late friday, nov. 13th 2009 at approx 0100 in the morning. i was on my back porch looking at the stars due east.
a large object traveling at unimaginable speed crossed the sky, from southwest to north east. i saw a multy colored streak across the sky that was moving at incredible speed, mostly yellowish color, and it was very wide, and very fast, and on a very straight line.It really freaked me out, and soon after , mabey a couple seconds later, a falling star went by on a similar path but a whole lot slower. i watch the sky's around here all the  time, and this is the first time i have seen something go by that i can't explain.
content.summary: Lightning fast flash across clear sky

content.detailedDescription: We were outside smoking when a star like light was spotted in the sky, white in color. it flew in a circle pattern 2 times then slowed down to almost a stand still. the light then began tracking to the right slowly and then to the left slowly. it entered what looked like a geo synchronous orbit and then changed its color to red and then back to white. it dimmed out several times and became brighter again. we watched it until it set behind the hill to the west. we could tell it was moving against the stars in the sky until it finally stopped and locked orbit. at first while watching the object we were wowed by it.
content.summary: Bright light, no beacon, changing directions, doing circles, changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
My younger sister and i were staying with our father on the trueba ranch north of beatty nevada. when my father left to go to work in beatty, i took my twenty two single shot rifle and headed up the ridge to the northwest of the home he was renting.
i walked up the ridge, and when i crested there was in the small canyon a white bright saucer shaped object hovering. i immediately layed down and observeved this large bright white object for what could have been up to five minutes. as i watched, the craft lifted off to my right, and in a matter of seconds was gone from my sight.
i was scared and immediately ran back to the house to tell my sister what i had seen, she of course did not believe me, and no amount of my pleading my case helped.
when my father returned home, i got the same sceptical reaction from him, he eventually shrugged it off with the sun being in my eyes. 
so with the sceptism i received from my family, i did not want to be thought of as a nut, so i kept my story mostly to myself. i have asked my sister if she remembers the incident, and she does.
i later met a man who was very respected in his field of work, and i told him of my experience, he told me my story was similar to one his mother told of a sighting she had in montana. she also did not want to be branded as a nutcase, so she kept her story mostly to herself.
content.summary: As a twelve year old i was hunting rabbitts and came over a hill a there was the ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
first off i want it known i want no recognition or the like for reporting this occurrence. i have sat on this for 30 years and recently decided its time someone hear the story. i was not alone either; i had three friends with me and we all watched this thing for well over an hour. not a chance in hell this was any type of man made object or equipment; zero -- none just to set that part straight... i know heavy equipment well, and farm equipment and the like, and this was none of the above; it was not anything man made. we all agreed on that after a long lengthy discussion on this sighting. we decided to keep quiet about this unanimously 30 years ago out of fear others would think we were crazy.... crazy or not; its time to tell the story.
  very late at night while parked on the side of a country road in my custom van playing cards and drinking a few beers (we were all around 21 at the time and no one had an apartment or our own place yet, so we used my van to get together in) we noticed this thing out in a snow covered field when getting out to take a whiz... there was major snow on the ground. it was a clear night. it made no sound or noise at all and was dead silent. it was around 400/500 feet away from us out in this field, just in front of a tree line. level ground, no obstructions at all. no wind, no snow or rain at the time. we had a clear and direct view of it. it was absolutely huge, and towered over the treeline it hovered in front of. we viewed it through some field glasses i had in the van and up close it was just this very bright yellow glowing light energy. no light bulbs or the like; every bit of the entire structures shape was illuminated in a bright dense yellow light, the edges were clearly defined and sharp; it illuminated the trees behind it and i could see into the branches of the trees behind it with clarity due to the brightness of the light. we had made a drawing of it.
   it was the shape of two huge circular spoke type wheels side by side, each at least 150 feet in diameter (by the size of the mature old growth trees behind it) each wheel rotating slowly and moving in and out towards a center pivot point, then back out, changing the direction of rotation every now and then, all very slowly. it was about 25 feet or so off the ground with no connecting structure touching the ground of any kind. the rotation was odd as the wheels turned contrary to any rolling motion as they went in and out from the center point between the two wheel structures. it had a dual beam like connecting structure between the two large wheel shapes with a central pivoting point. as a unit the whole thing turned end up a few times, one wheel over the other, then went slowly back down to side by side. best description is it was kind of similar to a double-decker ferris wheel in a way. this was not any ferris wheel. (especially not out in the middle of winter in an empty fallow field at 3am...) i searched the area the next day to see if i could gain access back to where it was at and it was impossible. there were no access or fire trail roads, driveways, farm roads, or anything. there were no houses nearby or barns or any kind of structure. (that's why we parked out there; there wasn't anybody we would bother and the cops never came out that way.) no power lines or towers are out there either; nothing. as said this is just a huge fallow field with a old windbreak tree line out back. the field had very tall field grass that was matted down heavy with snow and it was simply impossible to walk through this to get out there, i tried very hard to do this, but it was not humanly possible on foot. the object was long gone the next morning four hours later. i wanted to try and see what it had been doing. it looked like maybe it was doing something with the ground or those trees behind it, or maybe some kind of self maintenance? who knows? wish i did, i can tell you that much...
   we all watched this a long while as said, just amazed at what we were seeing. (we were not drunk just to set the record straight on that.) it was up to something out there. then it was suddenly unanimous among us; we all got this feeling like this thing was watching us back, almost as if it were examining us, and it really scared hell out of us all. we all became very frightened by it and decided it was time to leave. my friends watched it out the back window of the van as i drove away with the lights off, trying not to draw any attention to ourselves, that's how frightened we all became of this thing. when we got back in town we sat and discussed this for another hour or so. i got no sleep that night and went back out there not long after to investigate as said above. it was long gone...
   after never mentioning this for thirty years to any of the others (we seldom get together any more) i got together with one of these guys and said i needed to talk to him about something that happened a long time ago when he was with me. strange enough he knew exactly what i wanted to ask him about and spit right out with "oh you mean the light out in the field that night".... i was amazed he knew without any provocation. evidently he was thinking of it from time to time himself. one of the others has passed on now, and the two of us are trying very hard to remember who the forth friend was. we will figure it out soon. i will guarantee you they remember this with striking clarity.
   for thirty years i seldom thought of this event. now in the last year it seems to bother me a lot for some reason. don't know why, but i think about it a lot, so i decided its time to tell the story. well there you have it. i would love to talk to you on the phone about this if possible.
content.summary: Hovered off the ground revolving slowly...See story...

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were walking home from basketball practice when he notices 4 ligh green ovals spinning in a cirle and we both stopped and suspeced that it was spot lights but we live in a small town so nothing like that would be happing and my friend pointed it out and said that looks like a ufo and we both got in the dark and watched the 4 green ovals slowly spinning. we we both amazed at the sighting and watched for app. 20 min and then contuined on our way home. we will always look after practice to see if we could see this once in a lifetime event. i am very exited to see somthing so intresting me and my friend are staying after school to talk to our science teacher about the ufo sighting. thank you.
content.summary: 4 light green slow ovals spinning clock wise in a circle

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding my bike home and a neighbor of mine stopped me, yelling "look!.There's something in the sky!" 

i decided to stop. i gazed eastward toward the sandia mountains and saw 2  white-colored slow-blinking lights going around in an eliptical shape. 

what was interesting to me was the fact that at first i saw 2 of them and then only one. also the blinking frequency was steady except for random moments of pause. the lights would just stop blinking for some short span of time and then start up again. 

the man left down the street and i started to go home again still watching them as i rode my bike. about the the time i got home the 1 blinking light was no longer visible. 

about a couple of hours later as i was leaving home i saw the 1 blinking light moving in a circular motion again. i was with another individual who also saw this light.  and again it would blink at a constant frequency for a while and then cease blinking for a some short period to only start up again. 

i could see this same light for another 10 minutes as i made my way to school.

that is the extent of my observation.
content.summary: 1-2 blinking lights revolving in circles

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying with friends when i awoke at around 3:00 am.  got a drink of water and on the way back to bed i looked out the south facing window and saw a low hovering circle of red and white lights.  the lights were spinning counter-clockwise, and my first thought was that they were the lights of a tow truck (being from the city) and then instantly i realized that i was in the middle of nowhere - no tow trucks - not even any real roads.  

i was fascinated and stood watching out the window for about a minute or so and then that same area went completely dark.  i was not afraid, but rather felt like i was observing something secret; that the "people" thought they were safe from prying eyes and they weren't. there was no noise...They were just there and then gone.
content.summary: Saw a circular craft with spinning red and white lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw 3 large orange circles next to a street light or farm house from airplane the rest of the area was  dark.


my family and i were coming back from vacation we were on flight from texas to kansas city mo. the plane was not very full so after the plane was in the air, i move across the isle seat next to a collage girl  from texas  she was visiting friends in kc .I heard the captain say prepare to decent i guess we were getting close to kansas city. as i was talking to the girl i look out the window  it was dark and i saw 3 large orange circles in a straight line
they were next to a street light or farm house light just as i was going to tell the girl  they disappear i didn't say anything. the way disappear you seem those lava light they kinda stretch out that how they disappear one by one.I don't know if it was a ufo.
content.summary: I saw  3 large orange circles in a straight line touching together from an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 3:45 am, i was out looking at/for the leonid meteor shower.  

directly to the south, i saw the same thing as i described in my earlier report.  it is a light flashing in red, white, and blue.  again, it seems to be "hovering" over wide open spaces.  i observed it as it stayed stationary for about 15 minutes.  i came in for coffee and to warm up a bit.  when i went back out, at 4:15 am, it was in the same relative position.  i turned away to get a chair, and when i turned back, it was gone.

as of 4:30 am, it hadn't returned.
content.summary: Light flashing in southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
For the past 2 weeks i have been seeing alot of activity in the skies cabo san lucas mexico,the first time i saw something was 11 9 09 and it was completly by accident, it was a full moon here in cabo so i went out the front of my house to take a few shots of the night sky and the moon. i then took a photo and could not believe my eyes, in the photo there looked like a disc shaped object this i could not see with the naked eye, so i did it again and again and again, and the same things in the sky(every shot different but same objects) anyway i download the images to my computer and zoom in and to my amazement there were even more lights but more of a orb variety and alot of other ufo looking things, i can't tell you what they are but i have been filming them and i have alot of photo's to back up these claims, the ufo's were most active on the 11 15 09 2 days ago when they seem to act like stars and blend into the background on this night they made no effort to "hide" it would have been 2-3am in the morning when i witnessed this.
 they were alot lower than on other nights and moving across the sky at an amazing speed in groups of 2 some times more but the sky is different every night it is quite awesome but quite worrying all the same. with the disc shaped objects i zoomed in on my computer and it didn't acually look like a craft as such but some sort of window were faces were starring out at us and seeing what was going on i have seen faces in the clouds which unfortunatly have got pics of and another stabge thing with these dics was symbolism within the disc such as the stone mansions,i don't now what it is called but were the serpant is biting at its own tail. i hope someone can shead some light on what i am seeing.
content.summary: Ufos in cabo san lucas skies
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: I was on hwy 6 headed south of ely nevada. stealth blimp passed by headed easterly. it was surrounded by a lot of jet fighters doing maneuvers. nellis was having exercise named "imminent fury" at the time. i would have given a million dollars to have a good camera right then....
content.summary: Stealth blimp participates in

content.detailedDescription: Three c-130 transports {black} and more in the distance by the sound.There was also 2 large twin rotor helicopters, also black.Just wondered,since nothing else was happening in north western pennsylvania or northeastern ohio.I have not seen this much action up here since the last ufo out breakin mid-90's.I was walking my dog up near the football stadium,when the roar was deffening,the objecst were ours no doubt but all were black. all were heading to the east-south east.From ashtabula county to pennsylvania near lake erie.
content.summary: Black aircraft daytime

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were standing on my porch in south porland looking at stars. we noticed three points of light in a loose triangle formation moving across the sky. the objects moved from one side of the sky to the other in just a few seconds. an airplane was taking of from the portland international jetport at the same time.  the 3 points of light appeared to be at a much higher altitude than the  jet. the triangle formation that the k=lights held seemed to be much much larger than a jet. i was very weird.
content.summary: 3 points of light moving in loose formation at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting ready for bed when there appeared to be light outside, so i went and looked. i didn't see any light source, but what i did see was a shock. there were three round dense white clouds in the middle of a starry sky making a very large perfect triangle. to the right of me there was a front approaching with clouds. over a few minutes one of the three circles got sheared apart and disappeared, leaving the other two slowly drifting. my personal theory is that something very large caused this atmospheric distortion but was gone before i had a chance to look. anyway this occurrence did not seem natural in any way.
 
ron-
content.summary: Three round clouds making a perfect triangle in the middle of a starry sky.

content.detailedDescription: I arrived home from a movie.I stopped my car and got out and happened to gaze up.I saw a red and whitish pinpoint light.I thought it was moving across the sky,like a typical man made craft.Then i saw it squiggle,then move right,move left and reassume a line trajectory across the night skies.This is the third time i witnessed something i simply cannot explain.I called the local p.D. and the local airforce base and they had no reports of test craft in the area.I do not drink or consume drugs.I am not crazy.I just want to know why!Can you help me?After what i saw i got spooked and went inside.I have no idea what is was.
content.summary: Point of light that moved erratically

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving 3 miles outside of downtown freeport,il when i thought i saw something move fast into the clouds. i stopped and just snapped a photo. i thought through my dslr screen i could see something but wasnt sure until i got back home some 7 or so hours later. 

there are 2 photos, the first untouched and the 2nd auto adjusted through photoshop.

it appears as a semi-transparent shuttle-like craft to me. all the spots are from dust on my lens.
content.summary: Ufo discovered after viewing photos back home.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 6:40 p.M (best estimate) i saw a triangular formation above tucson. i was located near the corner of south country club and winsett and i noticed the oddity as i was walking from my backdoor (faces east) to my car. i tend to look at the night sky often, because you never know what you might see. i noticed three stationary lights because it was in a part of the sky that did, and i felt, should not have lights with the magnitude that they did. my best approximation is that they were located due ne from me and about 45 degrees up from the horizon. i believe that would place the objects very near perseus and/or camelopardalis. i don't think i can estimate the magnitude very well, but they were brighter than the stars in that region, but they did not seem as bright as, say, mars. what made me stop and recognize them is the equality of magnitude and the fact that they were not twinkling. no twinkling means not a star, and in such close formation and not near the ecliptic meant they were not planets. i should note that the triangular formation as i saw it was maybe the size of a large orange if i held it at arm's length. the formation did not appear to be a perfect triangle from my perspective. there were two lights that appeared to line up north to south. the third looked like it was a little west and slightly north to make it non-iscoceles, if this makes any sense. i decided to scrutinize this a bit longer since the sight was very odd. i think i observed the lights in a stationary pattern for about 10-15 seconds. no sooner had i stepped into a good viewing spot, ducking away from a nearby streetlight, the light closest to the north pole started to move toward the south. very slowly it broke the stationary triangle, and it appeared to be going a similar speed as a visible satellite would. naturally, i thought then that this could very well be a satellite, but what of the other two lights that appeared to be stationary? why no twinkling? i then noticed that the moving light, not changing speed by much, started to slowly veer toward the southwest. what i mean is that it is possible that the light slowed down slightly as it veered, but not by much. by this time, the moving light was now (if at arms length) maybe a half of a foot to a foot in distance. now that it was changing course so drastically, i was convinced that this was not a satellite. as soon as that first moving light started to veer, i set my eyes back to the other two lights and noticed they were now moving toward the north, at the same speed as the first moving light but in a near-opposite direction. in less than maybe five seconds, the two started to fade from sight. i might say that while the lights during most of this time were pure white, it appeared that the two lights moving together and now fading together started to twinkle slightly and maybe show flashes of blue. since the lights were so small and so faint, it was hard to discern distinct color in such a short amount of time. i tried to find the original moving light, the one that veered toward the southwest, but i could not spot it. i venture to guess that it faded into blackness, as well. i will add that this whole incident took place during a span of maybe 20-30 seconds. it was quick, and mind-boggling given that i could fairly easily assess that these were not stars and not satellites. i will attest that i could judge that the lights were indeed moving because i had the backdrop of a carport, trees and some "telephone" wires in the vicinity. it was easy to see that these lights were moving, if you happened to be paying attention. i can also attest that i was sober, that the night was cloudless, that there did not appear to be any flight activity from the afb nearby and that there was nothing other than what i have described above. in no more than maybe five minutes, i called someone who is fast becoming an armchair believer of visitations from those out in space, and he stated that it is very possible that i saw ufo activity. i did a little internet research in the next day. this led me to the mufon page, and i noticed that someone in sahuarita noticed three(?) lights. but those were colored, not white. i don't know that we saw the same thing. naturally, i felt a little stirred, because if no one else saw these lights, i felt validation in the fact that there are some strange things hovering above us. this is further evidence that we are not alone, as campy as that sounds. 

i sincerely apologize for not only having provided some approximations in my observations, but i do not have the kind of technology to have captured any of this for the record. no images. but then, i doubt that i would have caught any because i normally wouldn't carry a camera or otherwise. thank you for this opportunity to get my report out there.
content.summary: Three star-like objects that began as stationary and moved apart only to disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
The firey mass was highlighted by the dark colored dumbell shaped
object that was tipping fastly as it seemed more like tumbling,
as it fell extremely fast as it seemed to pull the fires upwards,
as it fell down,and shortly after- out of sight.
i was sitting at the taco bell parking lot, as i just ordered
two chalupas, and i was parked facing burger king,[facing westerly
direction],when i noticed the firey object, that had a darker-
interior shape like a dumbell, similarly to the ones i workout
with, that was clearly visible from where i sat.

the object fell fast as if it had been tossed abruptly-
such as tipping over your dumbells' really fast with force-
to repeat this action as to what i just witnessed.

since it faced aiming straight down while tumbling, and on fire
red in color- and it had a dark mass-which smoked as it vanished
out of sight. as my car digital time said at 5:43pm, and i had
noted that was quite odd,i wondered if the police were coming,
or if others like the fire department or something else might
come. but none were evident. i drove over to the nearest area
[which for me was warm springs blvd], to see if any police,fire 
or other emergency vehicles arrived. none came, none were noted.

since it faced downwardly, as it fell tipping with its firey
exterior,it seemed to smoke as it went out of sight. i would
estimate that it fell between highway 880,and the nearby r&d
buildings opposite of 880 facing the westerly skies of california.

gee, am i the only one whom saw this, and wondered if there is
any data from -6 miles away-moffet field that might have seen
something falling from the sky- was it a piece of meteor-
or something else?

well, maybe it fell without hurting anything. that's good. if it
fell on a rooftop or on a person's car, well he'd have to make
a insurance claim on the object that fell from the sky. after
witnessing this event, i figure'd that this may be the newest
insurance claims that will have to be dealt with in the future-
that if the meteors are being blown up or they disintegrate
as they enter earth's atmosphere, it's not so far fetched idea
now.

i decided i'm going to go and have a beer. maybe i'll have two.
i went to a country club, drank two heinekens, watched a few programs
and went home.[ i don't normally do this. so, i'm thinking why
did this happen?I am going to tell my husband, and post it too.]

i told my husband about this event, he said -do you think it will
be on the news? i said i don't know, let's watch the news and
find out. 

he asked me to give details about what i saw, so i did, and then i
decided to post it here. maybe someone else saw it too.
content.summary: Firey dumbell shape tipping end over end falling out of the sky in extremely fast fall in a few seconds observation

content.detailedDescription:
I have already reported this sighting.  

i have taken a closer look at the photo's i had taken of this sighting &
noticed that there are disc's & shiney object's in every photo.
i have roughly 65 photograph's of this sighting.

i will post some more later this week, if i have time.

file 1. taken @ 17.18 hh
file 2. taken @ 17.23 hh
file 3. taken @ 17.27 hh
content.summary: While taking photo's of hot air balloons

content.detailedDescription:
On the 1st of november at approximately 7.40 pm we were driving back from the matlock area in derbyshire. it was an extremely clear night, i had strong intuition that i should keep my camera with me, i sadly ignored that intuition and stuffed it into the boot. a decision that i would later regret heartily. we had driven for about 15 minutes when i became aware of a very bright light in the sky. planes fly overhead all the time and i guess this night was no different than any other, except to say that the plane i saw seemed odd, it moved too slowly, considering how low in the sky it was. moreover it was extremely low in the sky, helecopter low. it was pitch black outside the car so i could not get a good look at the plane.

what i can tell you though is that it's altitude stuck me as odd, as did its lights. it seemd to have one light in the middle and two constant lights on both flanks. it had a small blinking light underneath. as it flew low over carsington water, i'd say it wouldn't have been more than 300 feet up at the very most. my real estimate would have been 100 feet. now i'm not saying that this was an alien spacecraft. yet to me it was a ufo. ufo doesn't mean alien spacecraft that would be an etv (extra terrestrial vehicle). it was a ufo because it wasn't like any plane i have ever seen, it wasn't on a flight path i have ever seen. it moved slower than any commercial plane i have ever seen. what was it? i watched it fly over carsington lake and then i lost sight of it for a few seconds, it was gone. yet, i had a perfect view over the lake, as we climbed towards kniveton near ashbourne. where did this low flying object go? i certainly felt unnerved. rightly so. this part of derbyshire, matlock, wirksworth, bonsall is well known for its ufo reports, even more so lately. this year, 2009 has seen the highest incidence of ufo reports worldwide since records began.

my partner who was driving the car, doesn't really hold with ufo's. i think she'd have to see one to believe it. she tends to express the view that there is a rational explaination for this sort of sighting and that there is no pooint making a fuss. this is the view help by the majority of the population. if fact i believe it too, except that i have long had an interest in ufo's because of very unusual things i have seen for years now.

on with the story. we drove on, i had now got a sneaking suspicion that we would see something else unusual. there seemed to be a lot of activity in the skies, but nothing quite as startling as what i had just seen. when we got to uttoxeter, we were approaching the mcdonalds roundabout when i became aware of a very large red light low in the sky. the red light seemed to be near to the racecourse , it was at least 2 miles away though, so impossible to tell what it was, my partner also saw this. she looked a little spooked. i asked her to turn off toward the light but she declined and drove on towards stoke on trent. i couldn't help but feel that we had missed an opportunity to investigate. that said, having the family in the car probably wasn't the best ufo hunting opportunity. we drove on.

then things got really good. as we approached stoke on trent down the a50. we were at the britannia stadium when i looked across to my right (uk drivers side) and saw a very bright white light right over stoke town. i asked my partner what the hell it was, again she looked spooked and, again turned away from it opting to drive down to newcastle via the handford roundabout, much to my frustration, i wanted to try to get a photograph of this light. it was so bright.

as we left the handford roundabout the light became visible again. i pointedly asked her to look at it. it was a white light with tow smaller while lights on either side of it. as though on stalks or like spotlights. we could hear no helecopter noise, even though my partner assured me that was what it was. as we drove along the a34 we were both looking at this light. it was definitely no more than 100 feet off the ground. suddenly, and this is the best bit it changed colour from white to emerald green. again, i alerted my partner to this, i said "look at it, tell me it has changed colour and i'm not imagining it". she confirmed that it had changed colour, the two small white sidelights seemed to have disappeared. at this point we were directly by the tesco's at trent vale, and i could still see the object, i tried to get a photo. i took 2 and one caught a tiny bit of green glow...The image was very disappointing. 

we arrived home minutes late and i scanned around and then went out for a drive to see if i could see anything unusual, i couldn't. what we did see that night though was 3 objects that were unusual. for once i had another witness who saw at least 2 of these objects.

i felt sure that this incident was so unusual i simply had to check it out. i called the police that night to ask if the helecopter was up and flying in that region. they said they'd check and get back to me. no one got back. so i called again on monday morning. i spoke with staffordshire police and asked them to check. they, recorded the incident (trent vale) and ran checks to see if the helecopter was flying. they called back to say that they had no record of the police helecopter flying that night. this still doesn't mean it was an etv, but it rules out police helcopters.

other options could be military helecopters or the air ambulance. i called the civil aviation authority who told me that small aircraft do not have to register their flight plan with them.
so i have thus drawn a blank. whatever i saw looked weird to me. i'm keen to rule out check all conventional options. yet i'd just like to say that what i saw in all three locations that night is consistent with current ufo sightings across the country and the world.
see my crude sketch of the objects.

ministry of defense informed.
content.summary: Low objects across derbyshire and staffordshire

content.detailedDescription:
The day started out pretty normal... tony and myself were driving to look at this construction site for a new out-door mall. we had trouble finding the place. we came to this dead end, that was a four way stop each road wasn't built yet, but the stop signs were there. tony noticed a red star in the distance, almost tree level, but a little higher. it moved very odd, as if it were going and stopping. we continued to watch for maybe ten minutes. by now it had come rather close. we were waiting to see what kind of plane it was. thats when it came to a complete halt. possibly 70 ft. infront of the jeep. we both had to lean to look up through the front windshield. i rolled my driver side window down and stuck my head out.
this object is hard to discribe, it was blurry. i said something to tony, and right as i turned, thats when the flash happened. as if someone had snapped a picture of us, but the flash didnt go away, as if frozen. i remember seeing tony curled up with his head between his legs. my first thought was to crank up the jeep and leave. the object slowly followed us for a mile or so. when we came upon the first red light, i had to stop, but the light was behind us. it seemed to look like a car coming, but we were the only car in this dead end. it was pretty much right on us again by now, i could see it in the rearview mirror. when the red light began to go haywire, flashing from red to green to yellow in strange rythms.
so i ran the light and continued home. tony and i arrived at my mothers house really late, everyone was in bed already. at the time we didn't think much of this. until my mother question where we went the night befor, we realized that this all started at 7:30 and only seemed to last a course 20 minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Boomerang,   Flash,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Red star appeared, moved slowly towards us, stopped in sky, white flash.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving to slc (traveling from ely), i approached junction and saw a bright red light where i had never seen one before.  when i got to the junction, it seemed to have moved.  it was west and east of the building at lagies junction.  what i observed was a bright steady (not blinking) red light, it appeared to be about the size of a street light. it seemed to have moved from when i saw it first (driving) to when i passed it. 
i thought nothing more of it (other than it was wierd)until i went to the mufon meeting in ely last sat. night.  when i saw the films of the ufo, i was surprised that it was so small.  when i got home, i realied that i had seen a light at lagies junction previously.  i checked my bank account for charges in wendover, and it was august 7, 2009.   
no photos, i just thought you'd be interesting in knowing that your sighting report was not the only time that lights were seen at that location.
content.summary: Driving to slc, saw a red sphere light at lagies junction where i had not previously seen a light.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up at the sky while smoking a cigarette and when i turned around to go back in, i seen a light in the sky going over my house. it made no sound and had no wings/rotor blades and was just a bright light.  i then grabbed my camera and shot 20 seconds of it b4 it went behind the trees.  i estimate it to have been 1000 + feet up.  it moved rather slow as it went over.  when i first noticed it, the light was coming from the front of my house (west/northwest) going over towards my backyard (south/southeast). if you view the video frame by frame and look at frame 95 as well as 96, there is something there. that part is something i wish i could get another view on.
content.summary: It was a white light  with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
The witness called to report that she, her husband and 24-year old son had witnessed a starlike object which looked like a boomerang or rounded triangle through binoculars.It was accompanied by 6 to 10 smaller, objects. an airplane flew underneath where the object was seen. the witness began to feel that she was being watched and went inside the house. she has seen objects similar to this two times previously in roughly the same spot. 

several years ago on state road 84 a low dark shape flew over their car.
content.summary: Boomerang or rounded triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on i 25 near hwy 66 30+miles north of denver, co.  it was roughly 6:00pm when i noticed three lights north west that were staying still an in a large triangle formation. the light that was emitted was very overwhelming, for refrence  it was as if there were 3 stars in our atmosphere. i pulled over to watch these, due to how strange in nature they were.  there was no sign that they were air planes and also were way to high in the air to be helicoptors.  as i sat there watching the objects, the one that appeared to be closer in distance vanished followed by the one to its right.  the third light started to fade then bloomed into two lights stacked on top of each other.  then disappeared.  i have never seen anything like this before, i live in the country and see lights in the sky all the time but this caught my attention there was something diffrent about these.
content.summary: Three bright lights not moving in triangle formation, then vanished right in front of my eyes

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:45 p.M., sunday, november 15, my boyfriend and i were standing on our balcony near the eastern foothills of san jose. i suddenly noticed an unusually bright object low on the horizon in the northeast. we both stared, captivated by its brightness and the way it appeared to change colors in various patterns of blue, red, green and yellow. it also emitted different colors of bright rays in a sequence of patterns (the rays would appear from the top, bottom, diagonally and from the sides). we both remarked how this was unlike anything we'd ever seemed before; not a star, helicopter, airplane, satellite, or missile. it was a very calming, but intense experience. we also discussed how it seemed intelligent. the patterns of light, colors and intensity seemed deliberate. it also hovered silently and slowly back and forth and up and down. after about 10 minutes, the intensity diminished and the color patterns seemed to fade. my boyfriend and i went back in the apartment, almost speechless and in awe over the experience. my boyfriend returned to the balcony 10 minutes later and said the object had faded, almost appearing like a small, barely detectable star high in the sky--instead low in the horizon. he also said that a plane appeared to be flying near where we first noticed the object. we both felt slightly disoriented and excited after the experience. we both described feeling as though the object was attempting to communicate through the light patters.  my boyfriend seemed very at peace, while i felt a sense of anxiety all the rest of the evening.
content.summary: Extraordinarily bright object in northeastern sky flashed sequences of red, blue, green and yellow lights, both as rays extending from object and pulsations across object.

content.detailedDescription:
Place of occurance: duckwater valley (railroad valley area)
date:  july middle of the month, 1994.
time:  approxmiately 9:00pm
i lived on a ranch in duckwater valley; within the valley we have a housing area 3 miles away.  that evening i went to visit a friend at one of the homes at the housing.  arriving there and i got out of the car, i happened to look up into the sky, the night was halfnoon or more because i can see our small hills close by and the distant mountains (white pine mountains).  then i saw a dark circlar object above me at a height of approximately less than 1,000 feet.  reason for the estimation, our sourrounding hill are from 500 t0 800 feet high and it was not much higher than those hills  i estimated it to be 50 yards or so in diameter, no noise or light coming from it.  seems like it stood still for several minutes before it floated to the northeast direction to the main road that go to eureka, nevada (quater of a mile distant), from there it proceeded north going at a rate of about fifty miles an hour for three miles, turning west for half a mile nad south again for a mile,  seen like it was following the ranching and farming places.  i went into my friends house and told them about it they didn't seen interested so we just talked, being late in the evening i went outside to go home and it was gone.  several months ago i heard that a couple saw a silver disk object one afternoon not to far in the distants from them; people have seen these object over the years where we live.
content.summary: Happened in duckwater-railroad valley.

content.detailedDescription: A ten year old girl playing with her new video camera that she had received for her birthday films a forty second video that shows a possible ufo. it starts with the camera on her. you can catch a couple of sights of it while she is still on the porch. she the walks off the porch. as she is walking she points the camera toward the rising sun. there appears to be a saturn shaped object hovering low. it does not appear to make any noise. the video has already been sent to mufon by west.Christopher@gmail.Com.
content.summary: Youn girl playing with video camera catches possible ufo.
